channel.title: How fast can you type?
channel.description:
At http://10-fast-fingers.com , you can measure how fast you type. This is what my highest is: [code]You reached 279 points, so you achieved position 112152 of 1190799 on the ranking list
You type 357 characters per minute You have 67 correct words and you have 0 wrong words[/code]

item.title: How fast can you type?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Btw, they reset the rankings like on Monday or something.

Read full topic

I type so fast, that when I get done all my words are there.

You type 442 characters per minute
You have 142 correct words and
you have 3 wrong words
[/quote]

item.title: How fast can you type?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:57, topic:386937”][quote author=sageofmali link=topic=482706.msg3536010#msg3536010 date=1300569280]

You reached 295 points, so you achieved position 93484 of 1222717 on the ranking list

You type 414 characters per minute
You have 70 correct words and
you have 2 wrong words

cba to do it again. have to go to work. fun game though, ive been looking for something like this.

How is typing as fast as you can fun? I swear, people are wierd…

It gives you something to work for; to get a higher words/min.
[/quote]

Why do people care about that… More important things than thinking how fast you can type :P[/quote]
cuz you see people get noble prizes for dat!

Read full topic

item.title: How fast can you type?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“sageofmali, post:52, topic:386937”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=482706.msg3535763#msg3535763 date=1300555900]

Lmfao, everyone owns me in typing speed. Also, when I type in UBuntu Linux it, for some reason, always messes up the caps lock. Like, when I use it then quickly turn it off and press another letter, it would have two capitol letters. Like ^UBuntu

Uh, regardless of the OS shouldn’t you just use Shift to capitalize a single letter? Caps lock is only for long words that are all capital.
[/quote]
Yeah, I never got used to using the shift button. I’m getting used to it now.[/quote]That is quite possibly the weirdest typing method I’ve ever heard of. Yeah, definitely get used to Shift. 2 button hits vs. 3 for EVERY capital letter’ll obviously improve your speed A LOT.

Read full topic
